name: RiGBY
description:
Remy, a lab rat with the dream of breaking free into a new life, decides to escape using his powers of RiGBY, the ability to change color and gain special abilities. Each ability for each color is listed as follows:

Red - Invisibility 

Blue - Immunity 

Yellow - Super Speed & Super Jump 

To change between colors, press the key that correlates to that color (listed in controls section). You have limited uses between each level so don't screw up Remy's chance of breaking out of the laboratory. 

Controls:

 - Swap to Red (Z)

- Swap to Blue (X)

- Swap to Yellow (C)

- Jump (Space Bar)

Contributors:

*note: Jump = Space Bar
